game.name: Angry Rocketeer Frenzy
game.shortDescription: 이 게임은 모든 연령대에 적합합니다. 로켓 발사기를 사용하여,당신은 적을 파괴 파워 업을 수집하고 구조 차량을 소환 마지막에 싸움.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Angry rockeeteer frenzy - Are cursed robots trying to take over Earth? Not on my shift! Take your trusty rocket launcher into service and destroy all the enemies of our planet in this unusual mix of shoot 'em up and roguelite genres!

reviewHighlights.text: Would you like to play a pixel game whose main goal is to kill enemies with missiles? Then this is the place for you. Although the game is simple, but...
"Angry Rocketeer Frenzy" is an absolute blast! The gameplay is fast-paced and addictive, with vibrant graphics that make every level visually appealin...
